Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Shockwave:




"The bodies for the still intact Decepticons are created.  It is now only a 
matter of downloading their consciousness into these shells.  Then we will 
use the memories of Unitron and Firestarter to recreat their own so we don't 
have to explain as much.  This will take thirty cycles or so." Vehement said, 
looking to Shockwave as if he were an insect.

"Excellent." was Shockwave's reply.  

"Also," Sun Crusher added, "there is something you will most likely want." 
Sun Crusher walked over to the Guardian and its golden hue of a tendril 
wrapped around Sun Crusher's head, and a few cycles later Sun Crusher turned 
to the Emperor, handing out a disk.

"This, Emperor," he said mockingly, "are tech specs of the original Megatron, 
your ancient master.  Our Lord Unicron copied his tech specs before 
reformatting him into the imbecile that was Galvatron.  According to Unicron, 
Megatron may be here with followers, but we can't be sure.  This is how you 
tell if its the real Megatron or not.  If he isn't, I believe you and your 
followers will have fun ripping his head off."

"Of course." Shockwave intoned.  "There is another robot here who may be 
loyal to our cause.  Ravage, a Decepticon was re--"

"We know all about Covert Agent Ravage of the Predacon Secret Police.  We 
will retrieve his head and attempt to rebuild him.  It won't be easy since we 
didn't download his mind." Reflector said.

"Good." Shockwave intoned, not feeling talkative.  Although the Brotherhood 
had helped the Neo Decepticon greatly, he didn't see why Unitron would've 
allied with Unicron, the being who was undoubtedly responsible for the fall 
of the Decepticon Empire, who was also the being responsible for his death.  
In Shockwave's mind.
